1999 Southeast ACF Regionals Tournament

Georgia Tech is pleased to host the Southeast Regional for Academic Competition Federation (ACF). The tournament will take place on Friday evening and Saturday, February 26-27, 1999. The exact tournament format will be determined by the size of the field.

Questions should follow the official ACF distribution and formatting, and should be sent to Dave Hamilton not later than Jan 31. ONE PACKET PER SCHOOL (presumably from your best team), even if you're sending multiple teams.

Here's the fee structure:

        $80 base fee
        -35 for teams that have never played ACF before (no packet
            required)
        -15 for questions received by January 15th by Dave Hamilton
        -10 for each additional team after the first from a school
        -05 for a working buzzer system
To register for the ACF SE Regional at Georgia Tech, or if you have any questions about it, please email me at dsadmbw@prism.gatech.edu.

Hing Chan
Georgia Tech Academic Team
